website_summaries.verdict: Battery operated trimmer with ergonomic soft grip for comfortable hold. Easy to clean out after use.
pros: Accessories include an eyebrow guide and reciprocating head for ears and detailing
Rotary head trims hairs well with minimal snag
Removable cutting heads for easy clean down
cons: Some users find it to be of a lesser quality than other models

customer_reviews.title: Wahl Ear Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Wahl thinking it was a good brand. Does not cut the hairs. I went back to my other trimmers and I can tell that none of the hairs were cut by the Wahl. I was going to return it. But it seemed like to much of a hassle. Just disappointed it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: J. Renfro

customer_reviews.title: This thing is cheap and effective
customer_reviews.text: I'm 40 years old and about 4 years ago, I began nose puberty. This thing is awesome and for as cheap as it is, there's just no reason to have the dreaded old man straggler hair creeping around. It's so cheap in fact, I couldn't believe just how effective it was/is. Everybody should have one of these once that part of life begins - you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Wahl shipping their work to Thailand. For years I have depended on German made quality
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed to find out this was made in Thailand. Wahl a German made product that you can trust and that's what I thought I was getting. I don't remember seeing the made in Thailand branding anywhere just the big old Wahl insignia
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G. Oddly

customer_reviews.title: ... and waiting 10 minutes - I got a very nice and helpful young lady - my question was - ...
customer_reviews.text: After calling customer service and waiting 10 minutes - I got a very nice and helpful young lady - my question was - how do you remove the round chrome head and install the longer black attachment - she said - just "turn" the entire black head off- then "turn" the other black head on - no where on the case or on amazon's sheets did it explain this - once she told me - it was a breeze! - Love the trimmer - have use Wahl's products for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Essential Manscaping Tool - Do Yourself a Favor.
customer_reviews.text: All men should have this. Doesn't tickle, doesn't hurt, easy to use. An Essential Manscaping Tool. I see guys with hair coming out of their ears, nose, and long freaky eyebrow runaways and all I can think about while they're talking to me is why they don't get one of these and take care of those issues. Dude, do yourself a favor and clip that stuff. This product, in particular, is better than some of the other ones I've used in the past because of the smooth round protector doesn't tickle or make me sneeze.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wolfram

customer_reviews.title: This junk is a Wahl?
customer_reviews.text: This piece of junk is a Wahl?! For years I used their hair cutting products with gratifying results, until I wasted money on this. Dollar Store products are a better buy. Even with new batteries the motor repeatedly slows even when not cutting. Butter knives cut better than this. Just a frustrating waste of time and money. STAY AWAY for this piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Tony and Lira Diodato

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but pretty cheese design & quality
customer_reviews.text: The light is an utter joke - doesn't even seem to be an LED, so it's feeble with a brand new battery, dims quickly, and doesn't cover enough area to be of any use whatsoever. The grippy matte surface starts disintegrating into a sticky goo after a couple of years of very light use (once per month max for the nose and ears) and storage in a drawer at normal room temperature and humidity. Having said all that - it gets the job done adequately. Just a shame that it's so junky. Not what i expected from Wahl.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, if a bit cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I can't complain, though. They work. But when I use them, I never use them for more than a minute or so because the motor starts getting hot and smelling like burnt electricity and the motor starts fluctuating and running unevenly. I think if I left it on for more than a minute or so, I'd fry the little engine out. But it's not like I have a huge amount of expectation for battery trimmers that cost me less than $10.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Harman

customer_reviews.title: Need more power
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a nose trimmer, so I thought I try one (at the least price).. It's nice looking, but the power to clear that hair out is a bit weak. The first one I bought I thought it was a defect, so... I bought another (it's $11 bucks) same quality, but... I keep it - maybe I just need to spend a few more bucks for a better one............
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Wahl unit is not well made,
customer_reviews.text: Basically the ear, nose and brow trimmer comes as a unit (best described as a power unit) to drive three separate heads. Not one of the replacement heads stays on after you turn the unit on due to vibe ration.
customer_reviews.author: nnafpw3

customer_reviews.title: Sir Nose D'void of Funk!
customer_reviews.text: Works GREAT! Nicely trim all that nasty looking nose and ear hair, making you look and feel better! ...Gratitude.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy Lee

customer_reviews.title: The trimmer completely stopped working after 10 uses.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Wahl nose hair trimmer for less than a year. It was used maybe 10 times when the trimmer completely stopped working. We tried changing the battery, but it still did not work. The light still comes on, however, so we did not think it was the battery. We have no idea what is wrong and have no idea of who to call. I could not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: gb

customer_reviews.title: Came with a dead battery.!??
customer_reviews.text: The battery that came with the trimmer was dead it did not come with a detail head or eyebrow guide. I need this so badly I don't have time to return it before I leave for my trip. Thank goodness I do have a prior purchase with the extra parts that are interchangeable.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Wahl - a superb brand
customer_reviews.text: Love the Wahl brand. My old one lasted almost 20 years. Pros: lightweight. Single battery. Lighted but that really isn't needed. Cons: no case to hold the trimmer or the few small attachments (thankfully I reused the soft case that my other one came in). Great product and brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Cheap parts fell apart in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend got about 6 months of light use with the Wahl trimmer - he maybe used it a dozen times - before it died. The trimmer was never dropped or mistreated, but the metal bit in the top kept falling out. The plastic piece holding the top part together finally broke after many times of putting the metal trimmer back in. I bought a slightly more expensive trimmer with better reviews, so we'll see how that one holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor C.

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful enough
customer_reviews.text: I have some burly nose hair. Prior to buying this item, I had a Wahl nose hair trimmer that did the job for 10+ years, so I thought this would be a good replacement. Unfortunately, this one doesn't get the job done. After trimming the other day, my son looked at me and said I still had a lot of bats in the cave. I just purchased a non-Wahl trimmer to see if I get better results. This one's just not cutting it, so to speak.
customer_reviews.author: Lucanus Nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Pop the battery in and bzzzzzzzzzzzz
customer_reviews.text: Has anyone else noticed that as you grow older, all your hair migrates from the top of your head into your nose, ears and onto your eyebrows? This is like the Border Patrol for immigrating follicles only without the 4-wheel drive vehicles, badges or weapons. The built-in light is perfect for those late-night, covert ops. Talk about some serious trench warfare...this little item will solve all your ECA (Extra-Coiffure Activities) and put that smile back on your neatly-trimmed face. Disclaimer: Item will NOT restore scalp hair growth unless Super Glue is purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great for nose and ears but that's all.
customer_reviews.text: Love it very easy to use, although the light is useless and the eyebrow attachment doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Hair be Gone
customer_reviews.text: Wahl makes quality products at affordable prices and above all all of their products that I have purchased works well. This device is no exception. Not only does it cut those little annoying growths with ease it is quiet and easy to clean. I seldom have need for the light and have yet determined if the light can be cut off which is as minor a distraction as can be. I would have designed the protective cover for the cutter a little larger so that careless folks such as I would not lose it but that too is no big deal nor above all is it a deal breaker. Bottom line: Just right and dependable.
customer_reviews.author: John Schëar

customer_reviews.title: Best Wahl yet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a month and it seems more powerful than the Wahl I replaced. The rubber coating makes it easier to grip and the tolerance of the coupling between motor and blade seems tighter so it does not rattle when using. It seems to make the cut feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderful and Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: it's at? Read the reviews on this and I was a little worried from a couple of them however since it was the same brand my husband used before and loved it I went with it anyway and very glad I did!!! Works very well very sharp to remove hairs the first time and the blades are protected with in so not sure how some were cutting themselves???🤔 I would recomend this to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christy McEvoy

customer_reviews.title: This item best I've found for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: When a no-brand, cheap battery-powered trimmer stopped doing the job, someone recommended the WAHL brand. As I usually do, turned immediately to Amazon for a good price and quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: C C Crowder

customer_reviews.title: nice trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time looking for one with a small trimmer head that was not just the rotary thing. Hair grows from some odd places as we age. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: gift for my father
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my father, he enjoyed it, he uses it every week and he is delighted. the battery lasts a lot, cuts excellent hair and does not scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Subero

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It’s a trimmer- but..... the item indicated LED light- mine is not. The trimmer lacks any sufficient power for more than 5 mins. Maybe I got a 2012 model.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the accessories are nice and for the price you can't beat it! Plus it's small, light weight and doesn't sound like a jet engine when you trim around your ears! That's a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money, expected better from Wahl.
customer_reviews.text: The blades sometimes pull mustache hair instead of cutting. Even replaced the battery. I suspect the blades do not reciprocate fast enough. Even though it's inexpensive, I expected a better product from a name brand like Wahl.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin C Ezell

customer_reviews.title: This nose clipper is the best I've used
customer_reviews.text: This nose clipper is the best I've used, and the AA battery was just replaced after over a year of average use, which is about once a week. The cylindrical clipper attachment shaves all nose hairs and ear canal hairs well, while the clipper-style attachment works well on eyebrows and outer ear hairs. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A guy's perspective

customer_reviews.title: must clean well after each use
customer_reviews.text: try not to have a long cutting session with this product at one time because it will get too hot on you and not work until it has cooled down......nice clean cut though...I use it for nose hairs only for now
customer_reviews.author: DonnaS

customer_reviews.title: Much better than my old Panasonic that broke
customer_reviews.text: I had one of the Panasonic trimmers, which stopped working after many years. I decided to try the Wahl instead of another Panasonic -- and am very glad I did! It trims much, much better than the Panasonic ... smoothly, quickly, with less pulling, and overall just much better. Very happy with it so far and would definitely order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sitting in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Trims well, slight pull/tickle though
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a Sharper Image trimmer that really didn't do much of anything; it never felt like it trimmed any nose or ear hair for me. This one definitely trims hair off, at the expense of a slight pull or tickle in my nose. It is bearable, but makes trimming a little uncomfortable. The other attachment for trimming outside ear hair or eyebrows works very well. For the cost, it is a good value and does the job. The LED is pretty useless though...unless you plan on trimming in the dark!
customer_reviews.author: E. Sikorski

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. My husband said it was pretty useless and overly time consuming in comparison to just using scissors.
customer_reviews.author: susan deacon

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Wahl is a great brand and I have several but this product is very cheap and ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: James Anspaugh

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works great has lots of power to cut those thick nose hairs, doesn't bog down and is east to clean
customer_reviews.author: only4me

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for your Money
customer_reviews.text: Let's just say we are less hairier than we were last week. This is our second Wahl Trimmer. The first one we purchased over 8 hears ago and is used weekly by two people
customer_reviews.author: Carrie J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough
customer_reviews.text: Works well with nose hairs but not so much for trimming the unibrow with the attachment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This is far and away the worst nose hair trimmer I've ever used. It simply doesn't cut the hair. I'd rather sit in front of the mirror with a pair of scissors and a pair of tweezers. But wait! This also has the added bonus of being the worst brow trimmer I've ever used, as well! Again, I'd just rather use scissors and tweezers - at least then I know the hair is getting cut.
customer_reviews.author: John Ling, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He is happy with purchase. Performs well. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nose trimmer is worthless.
customer_reviews.text: Worthless nose trimmer attachment (which why I bought it), but the other features work good.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B. Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My first nose hair device so I was nervous. It is easy to use and really safe. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: frequent flyer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I gave the product a 4 because it does not cut off all of the hair like the razor does. Easy to use and clean. It is light weight and easy for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne M Turner

customer_reviews.title: Don’t suggest. Find a better option
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s not bad. But the light wouldn’t help if you was in pitch black. If you want a lighted nose hair trimmer, don’t get this one. It shaves the hair is back of nose pretty good. WILL NOT get the hairs around front of nose and doesn’t trim very close
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried the rotary head for anything yet but the detail head did a horrible job on my husband's ear hair. Since that was what I bought this trimmer for I guess that would make it pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: MK0298

customer_reviews.title: This offers Great Value and Great Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great product that delivers what it promises!! A Great Personal Grooming device!!
customer_reviews.author: DavidMc

customer_reviews.title: Good Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Had this one for over a year now, works well, battery choice of AA is much better than the lithium options. Stores well & has good power. Happy with the trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It actually gets in there and cuts your nose hair! Feels comfortable in my hand and in my nose! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Bodzuuk

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a long time ago and it does a great job. It has lasted a long time and would not hesitate to replace with the same one.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it didn't.
customer_reviews.text: I had another trimmer for about 6 years and replaced it with this one. I used this one about 5 times and it worked great. Then I tried it one morning and it just would not work. Changed the battery and it still didn't work. So $11.99 got me 5 uses.
customer_reviews.author: JoshBro

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works OK, but I preferred my old Philips. I kept this one, but got another Philips more recently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy use for Seniors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my 87 year old mother. She loves it. She said it is so easy to use and really does the job. She said it was one of her favorite Christmas gifts. As you get older things like this can really help in your daily grooming. She uses it for her nose and hairs on her face. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Sharpes

customer_reviews.title: God Sent these over
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I have tried many different types of nose hair trimmers. The first Wahl I had was from about 10 years ago and those worked really well and it didn't pull any hairs out. Then when it came time to buy a new one I ended up buying the Vortex by Panasonic due to their excellent reviews. But I stopped trimming my nose hairs for awhile because it pulled hairs out and I didnt like using it. This caused me to not cut my nose hairs for a few months and I ended up using some Crayola scissors but s*** was getting out of control. Then I bought these.. No Pull Guaranteed... definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace an old Norelco model that broke after more than 10 years of use. This Wahl model has a powerful little motor and works great.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaBoy

customer_reviews.title: Tested And Approved
customer_reviews.text: Best nose trimmer I have ever owned. Easy to use and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy V

customer_reviews.title: Decent product but is not a long term purchase
customer_reviews.text: It works great so far but I should have spent more as it seems like it would be really easy to break
customer_reviews.author: Todd Decatur

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this piece of junk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk!!!! Cheaply made! Couldn’t even get the heads to fit on properly. Instructions written in micro-print and inadequate. Broke trying to set up. Out of the box and in the trash within 5 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: works great but comb attachment is small and doesn't clip on very good.
customer_reviews.text: The nose and ear trimmer works very good. The eye brow clipper works but the little plastice comb attachment doesn't fit on very good. It fell off the first time i tried to use it. It is so small I couldn't find it. I just try to have a steady hand now while doing my brows.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use gets into all the niches and crannies.
customer_reviews.author: shari

customer_reviews.title: Proficient
customer_reviews.text: Does what is suppose to. So far very durable and easy to take care of.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Now everyone knows what this trimmer can't do for your nose.
customer_reviews.text: The batteries for both ear, nose and brow trimmers were dead on arrival. After I installed my own battery, the unit worked. It didn't cut many of the hairs in my nose. I can't recommend this trimmer. The attached light is useful to see the hairs that the trimmer didn't trim!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kligman

customer_reviews.title: Dedent
customer_reviews.text: Hello Wahl ear and nose clippers and goodbye to poking myself in the nostril with scissors or slicing my ear with my razor. It's easy to use, easy to store, easy to clean and PAINLESS/CUTPROOF. But don't count on the microscopic sized "integrated mini-spotlight" for any airport landing strip quality lighting when it's buried inside of your nose or ear.
customer_reviews.author: EddieSpaghetti

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Looking Packaging - Dull Trimmer Inside
customer_reviews.text: This came in a nice fancy box - and it looks good too. The trimmer isn't very sharp and the LED light is just plain dim. (I did try a second new batttery). I have an old trimmer (the same brand) that has several years of use. It is very well worn, yet seems much sharper than this one. Maybe these sharpen themselves with use?
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: 4 Months of use and it broke
customer_reviews.text: I have used this trimmer for the past four months about once a week. When replacing the attachments today, it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful trimmer! Unlike previous models that gave me a fright for fear it would cut me, this one trims quickly and without incident. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jennyinkeller

customer_reviews.title: Good for a year or so.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for a year or so. Then it just petered out.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: Not good cheap made
customer_reviews.text: Put battery in nothing won't run into put a new battery in still won't work
customer_reviews.author: edward brosky

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Good trimmer. I've got a large nose with plenty of nose hair. Thanks dad. Anyways a nose trimmer is a mush have for me. So fair zero complaints with this trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Only got one use out of trimmer - won't stay on
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a little while, but of the two heads that came with it, I can't for the life of me get the trimmer one to stay put - it just doesn't want to "latch" into place after just one use - ??? Manufacturers! Quit making stuff out of plastic!! It doesn't last!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammee

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I'd expected
customer_reviews.text: Just what the doctor ordered. I've got the nose and ears and eyebrows covered. That's something right there - an all in one. The blades are safe enough that I could probably groom the baby (not that I ever would), and yet, it can handle my coarser hair. It doesn't take long to saw through it, either, which is a real bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B

customer_reviews.title: Wahl makes a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works like I expected. Far superior to the previous device I owned. The Wahl name says it all.
customer_reviews.author: thewolf

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it for the light
customer_reviews.text: For the nose the trimmer seems to work. The light however is dim and worthless. The other attachments seem not to be useful. On/off switch is slippery and a bit hard to push on.
customer_reviews.author: Elky

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great little trimmer, great price and didn’t have to leave home to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: John Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what's necessary to enhance self maintenance.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything thus far about this piece of equipment. It is the second one that I have owned and the original lasted more than 14 years. Looking forward to many good years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: minimal cutting power, one hair seems to drain the power.
customer_reviews.author: Fadooz

customer_reviews.title: Wahl 5546-200, Ear, Nose & Brow 2 in 1 Deluxe Lighted Trimmer, Black/silver
customer_reviews.text: We all have hair in our nose. The older I get the longer they grow. I got tired of using sissor type trimmers so I bought this device. I received it today & tried it. No nicking, no pulling & no hairs left in my nose as before. Also took a lot less time. I'm a female, but no matter what gender you are I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: sas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: What I like on this one is it doesn't pull the hair, no pain. Great
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best nose and ear trimmers on the market! Bought this for my son and son- in - law! Good for beards, noses and ears! They both use it regularly and it makes a big difference! Holds its battery life and blade sharpness well!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible-don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is terrible!!! I bought it for use mainly as an eyebrow trimmer. The attachment for the eyebrow trimmer will not even attach to the base. The light doesn't work either, not that I need it but I would expect all the parts advertised would work at least on day one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Nice appliance. Have been using several months now. Seems to be well-constructed. I did not buy it for the LED light, but it is not very effective. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: way2practical

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to use took a few minutes to figure out how to switch from ear trimmer to nose trimmer instructions not clear on this but works good
customer_reviews.author: Antonio R.

customer_reviews.title: Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Arrived on time. The light is a nice touch but not really effective. I like the on/ off slide switch because previous trimmers have a twist option which ALWAYS broke. Great item especially for the price point!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but this one is one of the best out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the one that Hammacher Schlemer recommends. It does not pull nor hurt. I made my boyfriend use it, too, and he was weary since others hurt, but this one is one of the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Jennings

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, although I liked my older model better. No real problems with this one, except it keeps tipping over when I try to stand it on a shelf. Maybe they could flare out the bottom a little to help it stand.
customer_reviews.author: B. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: See above.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with how it performed as I expected it to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little trimmer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift. He likes this item for cleaning up the hard to reach places on his face. He never looked so good. It makes his life easier to be well groomed. I would recommend this to my friends for their husbands as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: still leaves visible hairs inside nose and ears
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trimmer to test it out and was surprised that no matter how many times I would go over my nose hairs and ear hairs, this trimmer would not cut them all.
customer_reviews.author: BSX

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Decent but not great quality. Gets the job done. I do find the light to be useless... I think there is a model that vacuums the cut hairs? That would seem to be of better use.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Have had several trimmers before but none were as good as this one. As usual delivery was prompt with product protected. Will buy another one if this one dies.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Brakebill

customer_reviews.title: Underpowered
customer_reviews.text: Have owned a Wahl previously and was very pleased. I kept changing the battery on this one thinking that was the issue. Underpowered motor.
customer_reviews.author: GBS

customer_reviews.title: As I get older I notice I like hair less and less
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done. As I get older I notice I like hair less and less. I don't want nose hairs, and this thing does a pretty good job at going after them. I've had it a few months now and use it once a week and it has held up just fine. For the money and the fact that this is a brand that's well-known, it was hard not to try it and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: William Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer's claim on the box states no pull/no snag guaranteed. I used this straight out of the box and it was flawless. It cut my nasal hairs effortlessly. Clean up was a breeze. I have very course hair and thought I'd have trouble with pulling, but this product came through. I recommend this trimmer. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Smith

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 hair trimmers from Amazon....this Panasonic, the Phillips Norelco and the Wahl 5546-200. Wahl and Panasonic easy to use and they work really well. Philips Norelco one star and very difficult to use and figure out. So if u r in the market, I suggest either this unit or Wahl...they are similar...do not buy Philips Norelco NT9110
customer_reviews.author: RAG

customer_reviews.title: The Ear, Nose and Brow trimmer...Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer works really well to trim the ears, brows and nose. I ordered one for my husband and our son and they both love them. The price for the brand Wahl is really good, the trimmer is not loud and I would highly recommend getting one for this price you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Girl

customer_reviews.title: Buzz off nose hairs!
customer_reviews.text: Nose hair removal was all I bought this for so that is all I can comment to. Works great. I was worried it would hurt. Nope! Got them all, not a single yank or anything. Hear those nasty nose hairs buzz off!
customer_reviews.author: kafel

customer_reviews.title: Works easily and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Does a great job. This is my 3rd one. one just got old(dull), one I dropped. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CaptNemo

customer_reviews.title: Not all parts were there.
customer_reviews.text: This product is hard to use. The trimming blade is very small. The eyebrow guide was missing from my order.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: Wahl 5546-200 Ear/Nose trimmer.
customer_reviews.text: I had a "as seen on TV" type nose and ear trimmer that lasted several years. When it started biting me instead of triming I replaced it with the Wahl. This has been a good product so far. I rate as a 4 instead of 5 because it leave some short (very short) stubble I can feel. I can not see the stubble, so it has to be very short. I would recommend this product to friends
customer_reviews.author: Foothills

customer_reviews.title: Great for ladies
customer_reviews.text: I am a lady in my sixties and have left behind the small scissors to do the job. This little apparatus works great and it does not pull or nick and I am finished in 60 seconds! I do recommend this for nose hair removal. Also, I benefitted from Amazon's unbeatable pricing, packing and free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sarai

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The light stopped working on the second day, doesn't seem to handle the tiny hairs as well as others I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best in my opinion... I purchased a Panasonic and have been very disappointed the Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh. It's ok...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are for a different model. Wish I could add a picture, but it doesn't seem to have an option for me to. 😕
customer_reviews.author: G .T.

product_meta.title: Wahl Lighted Ear, Nose & Brow Trimmer Clipper – Painless Eyebrow & Facial Hair Trimmer for Men & Women, Battery Operated Electric Groomer – Model 5546-200, Black/Silver
product_meta.description: The 2 in 1 Deluxe Lighted personal trimmer gives you two interchangeable heads and a mini spotlight. Our acculight mini spotlight lights up during use, so you never miss a hair. A reciprocating head for ears and brows, and a rotary head for the nose. It also comes with an eyebrow guide and a protective cap. Our ergonomic soft grip on/off switch allows for comfortable handling. Our precision detailer attachment head painlessly & efficiently removes unwanted hairs; rotary attachment head for painlessly removing unwanted nose & ear hairs, never miss a hair again with our integrated mini spotlight. Use at home, in the bathroom, or during travel; multi-scene trimmer is compact & portable; Wahl ear, nose, & brow is lightweight & allows for easy cleaning after use. With easily detachable heads, hygienic grooming is easier than ever with one head for your nose & another for everything else; rotary ear & nose trimmer head provides a hygienic grooming experience by keeping your nose and ear trimming separate. Our trimmer heads are easy to use & easy to clean, simply rinse under clean running water to clean the trimmer; featuring rinseable high-quality stainless-steel blades. Wahl clippers and trimmers have been used by professionals in the salon & barber industry since 1919. With self-sharpening precision blades & quality construction, Wahl clippers, shavers & trimmers deliver a smooth shave.
feature_bullets: Multi-Purpose Trimmer – Our precision detailer attachment head painlessly & efficiently removes unwanted hairs; rotary attachment head for painlessly removing unwanted nose & ear hairs, never miss a hair again with our integrated mini spotlight
Wet/Dry Use – Use at home, in the bathroom, or during travel; multi-scene trimmer is compact & portable; Wahl ear, nose, & brow is lightweight & allows for easy cleaning after use

Hygienic Grooming – With easily detachable heads, hygienic grooming is easier than ever with one head for your nose & another for everything else; rotary ear & nose trimmer head provides a hygienic grooming experience by keeping your nose and ear trimming separate
Easy Clean Rinseable Heads - Our trimmer heads are easy to use & easy to clean, simply rinse under clean running water to clean the trimmer; featuring rinseable high-quality stainless-steel blades

The Brand Used by Professionals - Wahl clippers and trimmers have been used by professionals in the salon & barber industry since 1919. With self-sharpening precision blades & quality construction, Wahl clippers, shavers & trimmers deliver a smooth shave
